item.title: Counting Crows - A Long December
item.description: G, C, Am, D - Possible simple strum could be D- D- on each chord symbol. More challenging could be D...D- DU for each chord. Or make up whatever strum matches what you're hearing in the recording.

item.title: Counting Crows - Big Yellow Taxi
item.description:
Chords used: D, G, Cadd9 (very easy--only 2 fingers needed to play this chord) I've lowered the pitch of the song by one half-step to fit the ukelele a bit better.
I do not own the copyright to this music.
